channel.title: Compiling Question/Error
channel.description:
Ok I had my server like 5 weeks ago and it was running fine but now, my old comp crashed and I have a new one. I installed No-ip I re-portfoward and I have set my enviromental variables in the USER Variables the Classpath and Path. I didn't put anything in the system variables. Now when I go to complie it says java isn't reconginzed as an internal r external command. I have the newest jave JDK 6 11.
-Any Help Will be Greatly Appricated- thanks--xcv12

item.title: Compiling Question/Error
item.dc:creator: @0wnt_pk3r79 0wnt pk3r79
item.description:
@0wnt_pk3r79 wrote:

i had the same problem i tryed probably 20-30 different compilers and none one work but this is one that i found that works very well…
@echo off
COLOR 04
title medionscape compiler
echo -------------------------
echo Files Being Compiled…
echo -------------------------
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause
cls
COLOR 02
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo Files Compiled
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling Question/Error
item.dc:creator: @empir3 empir3
item.description:
@empir3 wrote:

did Kedonot1 compiler work for you

try this one maybe

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic
